0.text: Mother: Let's get ready to go to the airport to pick them up.
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Mother: Let's get ready to go to the airport to pick them up.</prosody></speak>

1.text: Lahiru: Mother, remember, we needn't go to the airport. They'll take a taxi to come here.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme>: Mother, remember, we needn't go to the airport. They'll take a taxi to come here.</prosody></speak>

2.text: Mother: Ah yes, you told me about it this morning.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Mother: Ah yes, you told me about it this morning.</prosody></speak>

3.text: Father: Are you sure of it?
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Father: Are you sure of it?</prosody></speak>

4.text: Lahiru: Yes, father. I checked with him when he wrote to me last.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme>: Yes, father. I checked with him when he wrote to me last.</prosody></speak>

5.text: Mother: All right. Lahiru, you have to help me to prepare dinner.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Mother: All right. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme>, you have to help me to prepare dinner.</prosody></speak>

6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme>: Sure mother, I will.</prosody></speak>

10.text: (A) Read the conversation and say whether the following statements
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(A) Read the conversation and say whether the following statements</prosody></speak>

12.text: 1. Lahiru has a pen friend in Japan. ( ) 2. There are no direct flights from Nagoya. ( ) 3. Lahiru called his pen friend over the phone to ask about the airport pickup. ( ) 4. Lahiru and his father will help mother to prepare dinner. ( )
12.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme> has a pen friend in Japan. ( ) 2. There are no direct flights from Nagoya. ( ) 3. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme> called his pen friend over the phone to ask about the airport pickup. ( ) 4. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme> and his father will help mother to prepare dinner. ( )</prosody></speak>

13.text: (B) Read the text and complete the following sentences. 1. Lahiru and his family are getting ready to ………………. a. go on a trip. b. welcome a friend. c. organize a party.
13.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(B) Read the text and complete the following sentences. 1. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme> and his family are getting ready to ………………. a. go on a trip. b. welcome a friend. c. organize a party.</prosody></speak>

14.text: 2. Lahiru's mother ………………… a. knew about Nagoya. b. talked much about Nagoya. c. did not know much about Nagoya.
14.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>2. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme>'s mother ………………… a. knew about Nagoya. b. talked much about Nagoya. c. did not know much about Nagoya.</prosody></speak>

15.text: 3. Lahiru and his family will ………….. to pick up Lahiru's pen friend and his family. a. go b. not go c. go to airport
15.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>3. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme> and his family will ………….. to pick up <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme>'s pen friend and his family. a. go b. not go c. go to airport</prosody></speak>
